en.<img :src=\"loadingURL\">\n Sie tre: You will join the conference automatically as soon as it starts.
en.Bisher existieren keine Meeting-Räume fü:
There are no conference rooms for this course yet.
		Would you like to create one?
en.Bitte beachten Sie, dass dieser Raum auf: Please note that this room is being recorded!
Please note that this room is being recorded! The participants webcams could also be recorded!
Please give this link to the guest.
en.Bitte geben sie diesen Link und Zugangsc: Please give this link and access code to the guest-moderator.
en.Das Meeting gehört der Gruppe: The conference belongs to the group
en.Das Meeting hat noch nicht begonnen: The conference has not yet started
en.Das Meeting ist für die Teilnehmer sicht: The conference is visible to the participants
en.Das Meeting ist für die Teilnehmer unsic: The conference is not visible to the participants
en.Dieser Raum ist deaktiviert, da der Trei:
This room is disabled because the driver {{ room.driver }}
			is not active or has an incorrect configuration.
en.Dieser Raum wird momentan aufgezeichnet!: This room is currently being recorded!
en.Ein Standardraum wird immer als erster R: A default room will be listed first in the room list. On the front page widget booked rooms will be listed with a direct link the default room. If this room is marked as default an existing default room will be automatically unmarked.
en.Es gibt keine Server für dieses Konferen: There are no servers for this conference system, please choose another conference system
en.Es ist bei Aufzeichnungen dringend empfo: It is strongly recommend to start the conference and therefore the recording not until lecturers have joined.
en.Es ist bisher kein Meetingsserver konfig:
A video conferencing system has not yet been configured yet.
		Please contact a system administrator!
en.Ihre Änderungen sind noch nicht gespeich: Your changes have not been saved yet!
en.In diesem Ordner befinden sich %{ count:
There are %{ count } files in this folder.
They are hidden to remove clutter.
Check "Show all files" to list them
No recordings available for room "{{ room.name }}
en.Name: Name
en.Sofern der Gast keinen Namen eingibt, wi: This name will be used if the guest does not state one.
en.Verknüpfen Sie einen Ordner mit diesem R: Link a file folder with this room. All files in that folder will be uploaded automatically when the conference starts. You can switch between files in the conference.
en.Verwenden dieses Treibers zulassen: Allow this driver to be used
en.Wir empfehlen Ihnen, einen Standardraum: We recommend to set a default room.
en.Zum Hauptordner - Ordnerauswahl aufheben: Back to main folder - revoke selected folder
en.Sie wurden eingeladen, als Moderator bei: You have been invited to join as a moderator
en.Der ausgewählte Server ist in diesem Ver: The selected server is no available for this course type.
en.Durchführung und Verwaltung von Live-Onl: Conduct and manage live online conferences, events and video conferencing. Face-to-face communication can be used to bridge distances, external experts can be involved and students can be accompanied in projects and internships.
en.Arbeitsbereich zum Anpassen der Gesamtan: Workspace to customize the overall view of a course conferences.
en.Gesamtansicht aller von Ihnen erstellten: View of all conferences you have created sorted by semester or by name.
en.Administrationsseite für das Plugin zur: Plug-in administration page for holding and managing live online conferences, seminars and video conferences.
en.Das gesuchte Meeting existiert nicht meh: The conference does not exists anymore!
en.Das gesuchte Meeting ist nicht verfügbar: The conference you search for is not available!
en.Der Raum wurde auf dem Microsoft-Server: The room has not yet been created on the Microsoft server, this usually takes 1-2 minutes. Please try again later!
en.Label: Label
en.Nur in folgenden Veranstaltungskategorie: Only usable in the following course categories
en.Der Beschreibungstext wird Lehrenden ang: This description will be shown lecturers if this server is selected.
en.Die maximale Länge (in Minuten) für das: The maximum length (in minutes) for this conference. After the configured duration the conference (room) will be closed automatically. If all participants left before the the time runs out or a moderator actively finishes the meeting the room will be closed as well.
en.Legen Sie fest, ob externe Gäste mit Ein: Specify whether users with an invitation link can attend the conference as moderator.
en.Legen Sie fest, ob Benutzer mit Einladun: Specify whether users with an invitation link can attend the conference as guests.
en.Moderatoren vor Teilnehmendenzutritt fra: Ask moderator before participants get access
en.Legen Sie fest, ob Gäste und Teilnehmer: Decide if guests and participants can join the conference directly or if a moderator has to approve every join.
en.Jeder Teilnehmer kann die Konferenz star: Every participant can start the conference
en.Opencast wird als Aufzeichnungsserver ve: Opencast is used as recording server. This function is in test mode and errors may still occur.
en.Sofern erlaubt, werden auch die Webcams: If allowed, webcams will be recorded as well. The Opencast system has to support this function in order for it to work.
en.Erlaubt es Moderatoren, die Medien und E: Allows moderators to record the session for later playback. The recording has to be started by a moderator during the session.
en.Legen Sie fest, ob neben Lehrenden auch: Specify whether not only teachers but also participants should have access to the recordings.
en.Wenn diese Option aktiviert ist, ist die: If this option is enabled, recordings are only possible with a correct series id associated to the course.
en.Bei Aktivierung dieser Option können aus: If this option is activated, only moderators can see the webcams shared by participants.
en.Wenn leer, wird die Standardnachricht an:
If empty, a default message will be displayed. You can add the following keywords, which will be replaced automatically:
                %% CONFNAME %% (session name), %% DIALNUM %% (dial up number)
en.Die Überprüfung der Servereinstellungen: The verification of the server settings for %s was not successful, but was saved anyway.
en.Der Treiber %s kann nicht verwendet werd: The driver %s cannot be used because it has not server.
en.Die Adresse des Feedback-Supports muss e: Die mail address for the feedback support has to be vaild
en.Dieser Raum konnte nicht gefunden werden: This room could not be found
en.Der Raum konnte nicht auf dem Meetingerv: The room could not be deleted on the conference server and therefore will still be listed here!
en.Dieser Raum in diesem Kurs kann nicht ge: This room in this course cannot be found!
en.Konnte dem Meeting nicht beitreten, Komm: Could not join the conference, communication with the conference server failed.
Could not join the conference, communication with the conference server failed. (
en.Das automatische Hochladen von Folien is: Automatically upload of materials is currently not possible
en.Es existiert bereits ein gleichnamiger R: A room with the same name already exists.
en.Der Raumname darf nicht leer sein: The room name cannot be empty
en.Die ausgewählte Gruppe ist nicht mehr ve: The selected group is not available anymore
en.Es ist keine Kontaktadresse hinterlegt!: There is no contact address configured! Please contact a system administrator!
en.Der gewünschte Ordnertyp ist ungültig!: The select folder type is invalid!
en.Virtueller Raum, mit dem Live-Online-Tre: Virtual room with which live online conference, courses and video conferences can be held. Participants can hear each other during a conference and, via a connected webcam, see and work with each other, if available. Slides can be presented and queries can be carried out. A window in the user interface of one's own computer can be made visible to others in order to show certain websites or applications to the participants, for example. In addition, the course can be recorded and made available to interested parties.
en.Face-to-face-Kommunikation mit Adobe Con: Face-to-face communication with Adobe Connect or BigBlueButton
en.Videokonferenz- und Veranstaltungsmöglic: Video conferencing and event facility;Present live on the web and draw and work together;Communication via microphone and camera;Ideal for decentralised learning and working groups;Linking to already existing own rooms
en.Derzeit finden keine Meetings in den geb: Currently no conferences are planned in your courses.
en.Allgemeine Konfiguration des Meetings-Pl: General configuration for the conferences plugin in JSON
en.Konfiguration des Meetings-Plugins im JS: Configuration for the conferences plugin in JSON
